source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000010_MAXIMA<tab>They're here, Commander.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000010_MAXIMAラウバーン様。
「暁」のお二方をお連れいたしました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000020_RAUBAHN<tab>And I for one am grateful that they are. I'm told you've been busy since our paths last crossed at the Ghimlyt Dark.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000020_RAUBAHNおお、来てくれたか。
ギムリトの戦場以来だな……。
また達者な姿を見ることができて何よりだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000030_RAUBAHN<tab>Not that I understand half of it. When the Scions spoke of other worlds, I'd struggle to describe what I pictured.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000030_RAUBAHNあれからのことは「暁」の報告で聞いてはいるものの、
事が異世界に及ぶとなると、吾輩の知識では理解が追いつかん。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000040_RAUBAHN<tab>Mayhap things would seem clearer were I to hear the tale from your own lips, but I'm afraid the situation will not afford us that luxury.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000040_RAUBAHN貴様の口から、ぜひ詳しく……
と言いたいところだが、こちらも差し迫った状況でな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000050_RAUBAHN<tab>I trust you two require no introduction.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000050_RAUBAHNそれも、この者がもたらした情報によるものだ。
よもや、紹介する必要もなかろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000060_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>We meet again, hero of Eorzea.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000060_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>また会ったな、エオルゼアの英雄よ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000070_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Must we repeat this ridiculous display? I pose no threat to you─though what I come to warn you of very well might.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000070_SHADOWHUNTERそう警戒するな。
此度は、争うためではなく、
新たな脅威の存在を報せるために参ったのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000080_RAUBAHN<tab>Had he meant to do us harm, I hazard he would have kept to the shadows─and brought more than two companions.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000080_RAUBAHNガイウスの言葉に嘘偽りはないだろう。
この者はかつて己が侵略し、いまや敵国となったここアラミゴに、
わずかふたりの部下だけを伴って現れた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000090_RAUBAHN<tab>We need not pretend to be the best of friends, but I hope we can put aside our differences for the present.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000090_RAUBAHN吾輩も複雑な気持ちがあるのは否定できんが、
その覚悟は信じるに値するものだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000100_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>As you are doubtless aware, Ser Estinien and I cooperated to rid the world of Black Rose in your absence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000100_SHADOWHUNTERうぬはすでに、竜騎士エスティニアンから聞き及んでいるであろう。
奴と我が、行動をともにしていたことを……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000110_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Our journey together took us as far as the imperial palace, where we witnessed Emperor Varis meet his death at Zenos's hand.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000110_SHADOWHUNTER我らは帝都魔導城において、
ゼノスによるヴァリス陛下の殺害を目の当たりにした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000120_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Being the sole witnesses to this crime, and in no position to defend our innocence, we were then forced to flee, each pursuing his own avenue of escape.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000120_SHADOWHUNTERそこで、近衛たちに皇帝陛下暗殺の疑いをかけられた我らは、
二手に分かれて脱出を試みたのだが……
その際、かの竜騎士は見慣れぬ魔導兵器と遭遇し、撃破したという。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000130_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>When we were later reunited, Estinien claimed to have encountered an unfamiliar kind of machina during his flight. But to me, his description seemed anything but. And upon further investigation, I found that I was right.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000130_SHADOWHUNTER後に話を聞いたとき、我は耳を疑った。
しかし、部下とともに調査をした結果、ひとつの確信に至ったのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000140_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>The Empire is developing a new Ultima Weapon.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000140_SHADOWHUNTERアルテマウェポンの後継機が開発されていた、
とな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000150_KRILE<tab>What? That Allagan monstrosity? Created to vanquish primals? ...With which you yourself once thought to conquer Eorzea?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000150_KRILEアルテマウェポンですって！？
かつて、あなたたちがエオルゼア侵攻に投入した、あの……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000160_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>The same. In my foolishness, I sought to harness its power─and became the Ascians' pawn in so doing.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000160_SHADOWHUNTERそうだ、愚かにもアシエンにそそのかされ、
我が再生させた、古代アラグ文明の対蛮神兵器……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000161_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>But you know as well as I how that tale ended.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000161_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>その末路は知ってのとおり、目の前の英雄によって撃破された。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000170_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>The Weapon itself, excavated from beneath this very city, was destroyed ere we could fully unravel its secrets. And that should have been the end of it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000170_SHADOWHUNTERあれは元はといえば、アラミゴの遺跡で発掘されたもの。
後継機など、造れようはずもないと思っていたが、
密かに研究が行われていたようだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000180_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>But, unlikely as it sounds, the Empire's efforts to recreate it have somehow borne fruit─primarily through secret research conducted by the VIIth Imperial Legion, it would seem.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000180_SHADOWHUNTERさらに調査したところ、新たなアルテマウェポン計画は、
第VII軍団によって行われていたことが判明した。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000190_KRILE<tab>Wait. The VIIth was all but annihilated at Carteneau─along with its legatus.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000190_KRILE第VII軍団といえば、
5年前の「カルテノーの戦い」で壊滅したはずじゃ……？
軍団長のネールも戦死したはずでしょう？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000200_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Indeed, few survived. The VIIth as it is now has little in common with the legion led by van Darnus, and its leadership has changed hands several times since.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000200_SHADOWHUNTERいかにも。
かの軍団は総崩れとなり、生還者は僅かだった。
現在の第VII軍団は、後に再編されたものでほぼ別組織だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000210_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>Precisely how this project has continued despite such turmoil, and under whose auspices, remains a mystery.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000210_SHADOWHUNTERしかも、再編後も軍団長の戦死や更迭が繰り返されてな。
今や何者が計画を進めているのかすら不明だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000220_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>What we do know, however, is that a number of prototypes have been produced...and that one of them is on its way to Eorzea.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000220_SHADOWHUNTER確かなことは、
複数の試作機が開発されており、うち1機が、
エオルゼアに向けて解き放たれようとしていることのみ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000230_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>We attempted to stop it, but it was all we could do to slow its progress. So we resolved instead to bring you warning.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000230_SHADOWHUNTER我らは、これを阻止しようとしたが、
その圧倒的な戦闘力を前に、足止めをするのが精一杯でな。
ひとまず撤退し、エオルゼア側に危機を報せることとしたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000240_MAXIMA<tab>And right glad are we that you did─though it soundly dashed our hopes that tensions might ease at last...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000240_MAXIMAやっと戦況が落ち着いてきたところなのですが……
新たな火種が迫っているのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000250_RAUBAHN<tab>As it is, we've begun to strengthen our presence in the Ghimlyt Dark, and are assembling a force to meet the coming threat. A force with you in its vanguard, I hope.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000250_RAUBAHN報せを受けて、エオルゼア同盟軍では、
改めて国境地帯ギムリトの防備を固めると同時に、
迎撃作戦の検討に入った。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000260_RAUBAHN<tab>Before you say anything, I know full well you have pressing concerns of your own. Your comrades remain in peril, and I would not ask you to forsake them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000260_RAUBAHN貴様を呼んだのも、そのため……。
アルテマウェポンと戦い、撃破したことのある貴様に、
迎撃部隊への参加を願いたいのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000270_RAUBAHN<tab>But the fact remains that you and you alone have faced the Ultima Weapon and emerged victorious. We need you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000270_RAUBAHNむろん、これは無理強いできることではない。
「暁」の仲間たちが厳しい状況にあるともなれば、なおさらな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000280_RAUBAHN<tab>And so, when the time comes─<var 1A 02 /var>if<var 1A 01 /var> your comrades can spare you─I bid you lend us your strength. I've assigned an officer to await your word.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000280_RAUBAHNだが、もしも参戦の意思ありということであれば、
ぜひ「解放軍の将校」に声をかけてもらいたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000290_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>The Ascians' downfall was to be the work of my remaining days...but it was my hand that kindled these flames, and I cannot allow them to spread any further.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000290_SHADOWHUNTER我はアシエンを狩り尽くすことに執念を燃やしていたが、
此度の件からも、浅からぬ因縁を感じている。
捨てたはずの過去に決着をつけねばならぬようだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000300_SHADOWHUNTER<tab>I will do what I must to see this mistake consigned to history once and for all...even if it means begging your aid. The fates will enjoy the irony, even as I endure the ignominy.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000300_SHADOWHUNTER一度は刃を交えたことのある我が、
参戦を求められる立場にないことは承知している。
が、うぬが力を貸してくれるとなれば、これ以上なく心強い。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000310_MAXIMA<tab>I too shall make for the border and offer my skills, meager though they seem in such company. Mayhap we shall meet there anon.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000310_MAXIMA私も国境地帯へと向かい、
微力ながら後方支援をさせていただきます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000320_KRILE<tab>Though we can ill afford to ignore the coming of a new Ultima Weapon, our friends' plight grows ever more precarious, and none save you can join them in the First.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000320_KRILEアルテマウェポンの後継機は、確かに大きな脅威よ。
でも、切迫した状況を前に賢人たちを呼び戻すことも大事。
第一世界へ行き来できるのは、あなただけだしね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000330_KRILE<tab>I only hope you are not forced to make a choice...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000330_KRILE<tab>どちらを優先させるかは、あなたの判断に任せるわ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000340_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Now that we're all here─what news from the Source?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000340_MYSTERYVOICEさて、皆に集まってもらったところで、
まずは彼から、原初世界の近況を報告してもらおう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Now that we're all here─what news from the Source?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000350_MYSTERYVOICEさて、皆に集まってもらったところで、
まずは彼女から、原初世界の近況を報告してもらおう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000360_ALPHINAUD<tab>A new <var 1A 02 /var>Ultima Weapon<var 1A 01 /var>...? We must count ourselves lucky that Gaius has pledged his assistance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000360_ALPHINAUDふむ……。
ここにきて、アルテマウェポンの後継機とはね。
ガイウスの協力は、大きな助けになりそうだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000370_YSHTOLA<tab>While this is indeed a worrying development, I think the state of the Empire as a whole greater grounds for concern.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000370_YSHTOLAその件ももちろんだけど、
今後、ガレマールという国そのものがどうなるやらよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000380_YSHTOLA<tab>With the Emperor slain and Zenos returned, it is impossible to predict how matters will unfold in Garlemald. The Ultima Weapon may be but the first of many unpleasant surprises.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000380_YSHTOLA帝都での動乱や、身体を取り戻したゼノスのこと……
どこを切り取ってもきな臭いわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000390_URIANGER<tab>The situation beareth closer observation, of that there is no doubt─and doth compound our need to return unto the Source.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000390_URIANGERまさに、何が起きてもおかしくないといった状況でしょう。
然ればこそ、我々も可及的すみやかに、
原初世界へ帰還すべきだとは思いますが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000400_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Then let us address that issue. Our long search for a means to see you safely home may well be nearing its conclusion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000400_MYSTERYVOICEそれでは私から……
皆を帰還させるための準備について、
状況を共有させてもらおう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000410_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Thanks in large part to Urianger and Beq Lugg's invaluable insight, we have succeeded in fashioning a vessel for the journey.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000410_MYSTERYVOICEまず、器となる白聖石をベースとした「新たな魔具」に関してだが、
ウリエンジェとベーク＝ラグ殿の協力もあって、
試作品の作製まで完了したのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000420_BEQLUGG<tab>We set out to create a crystalline container retaining the more useful properties of white auracite, but without its regrettable limitations. And after a good deal of trial and error, we made one.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000420_BEQLUGGこれについては、ワシらの努力というより、
元となる白聖石の設計が優れていたと言うべきだろうな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000430_BEQLUGG<tab>An ark for soul and mind both, that will allow your incorporeal self in its entirety to be ferried between worlds... A “spirit vessel,” if you will.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000430_BEQLUGG多少手を加えただけで、魂と記憶を保存する魔具……
名付けて「ソウル・サイフォン」へと改良できたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000440_BEQLUGG<tab>However...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000440_BEQLUGG<tab>しかし、だな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000450_ALPHINAUD<tab>However?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000450_ALPHINAUD<tab>魔具が完成したというのに、何か問題でも？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000460_URIANGER<tab>Though the vessel is possessed of the requisite qualities to hold mind and memory, it wanteth yet for a means to <var 1A 02 /var>receive<var 1A 01 /var> of them. For that, we must needs imbue it with the Exarch's innate gift.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000460_URIANGER器たる「ソウル・サイフォン」は用意できました。
ですが、それに記憶を込めるためには、
水晶公に掛けられた「記憶継承」の秘術を組み込まねばなりません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000470_YSHTOLA<tab>A gift that lives on only through the blood of the Allagan emperors...which certainly does not flow within auracite, or any other crystal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000470_YSHTOLA話が見えてきたわ。
アラグの秘術は、水晶公に流れる「血」を触媒にしている。
でも、当然ながら新しい魔具は、その血をもたない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000480_URIANGER<tab>Just so, milady. The blood serveth as a conduit of sorts─in its absence, memory cannot pass from mind unto mind, nor from flesh unto crystal.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000480_URIANGERそのとおりです。
何らかの手法を用いて、記憶継承の触媒となる要素を、
魔具に入れ込まねばならないのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000490_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That being the case, we must either alter the process of inheritance so as to require no such thing, or determine a means by which my blood may permeate the vessel.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000490_MYSTERYVOICE早い話が、記憶継承術を大幅に改変するか、
触媒たる「血」を魔具に取り込む方法を見つけるか、
ふたつにひとつしかないというわけだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000500_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I am hopeful that the records found within this tower will yield the knowledge we require to pursue one or the other of these avenues.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000500_MYSTERYVOICEそれで今は、この塔に遺された古代アラグの研究記録を、
改めて、調べなおしているところさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000510_BEQLUGG<tab>As well you should be! The Allagans' body of aetherological research is extraordinary. I can scarce believe it the work of ages past.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000510_BEQLUGGいやはや、アラグの魔科学とは実に途方もないものだな。
これが数千年もの昔に、栄華を誇った文明の産物とは、
信じられんよ、まったく……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000520_BEQLUGG<tab>But its underlying principles are not so very different from those of my own field of study. Given time, we will find the answers we seek.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000520_BEQLUGGだが、理論体系には我らの魔法との共通点も少なくない。
微力ながら、引き続きワシも手伝わせてもらうよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000530_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I know that you can ill afford to wait, and it pains me that I must ask you to do so. I can only reaffirm my promise to you that a solution will be found.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000530_MYSTERYVOICEこの状況で、いましばらく時間をというのは心苦しいが……
以前にも誓ったように、必ずやりとげてみせよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000540_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Whatever it takes, I <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> see you safely home.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000540_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>だから、信じて待っていてもらいたい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000550_LYNA<tab>My apologies.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000550_LYNA<tab>(-？？？？-)お話中のところ、失礼いたします。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000560_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I do hope you haven't come to tell us that mortal peril fast approaches.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000560_MYSTERYVOICEライナか。
何か問題でもあったのか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000570_LYNA<tab>No. I had hoped to speak with the Warrior of Darkness.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000570_LYNAいえ、あのう……。
実は「闇の戦士」殿に頼みたいことがありまして、
その姿を見かけたので、無礼を承知で参りました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000580_LYNA<tab>But there is no need to cut short your meeting on my account. I will be waiting outside.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000580_LYNAよろしければ、詳しくは外でお話しさせてください。
それでは、失礼します。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000590_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Why not speak in here─she knows I don't mind. Unless she didn't want to...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000590_MYSTERYVOICE話ならば、ここですればいいものを……。
最近どうも、ライナがよそよそしい気がする……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000600_ALPHINAUD<tab>Perhaps I might accompany you? Though I am woefully ill-qualified to assist in the Exarch's research, I may yet be of some use to Lyna.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000600_ALPHINAUD君が行くのなら、私もついていっていいかい？
魔具の完成まで、待つほかなさそうだからね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000610_LYNA<tab>Did you slay this eater? Your orders were to await the main force before engaging.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000610_LYNAはぐれ罪喰いを倒したのですか？
本隊の到着までは手を出さぬように、命じたはずですが。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000620_RESOLUTESOLDIER<tab>No, Captain! It wasn't us, I swear it! A man came out of nowhere and cut it down before we knew what was happening.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000620_RESOLUTESOLDIERそれが……私たちじゃないんです。
突然現れた、旅人らしき者があっという間に……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000630_LYNA<tab>By himself? Certainly it is no Lightwarden, but nevertheless...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000630_LYNAその者が、ひとりで？
はぐれとはいえ、かなりの力を持った罪喰い……
相当な手練れとて、そう易々と倒せるはずがありません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000640_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)It's true! Felled it with a single swing of his axe, he did! Never seen anything like it!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000640_BRAVESOLDIER(-勇ましい衛兵-)手練れどころか、あんな猛者は見たことありません！
どこからともなく現れたと思ったら、
斧をひと振りで、いとも簡単に罪喰いを仕留めたんです！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000650_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)So I says to him, “Who are you, the Warrior of bleedin' Darkness!?”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000650_BRAVESOLDIER(-勇ましい衛兵-)俺、思わずその人に聞いたんですよ。
「あなたが噂に聞く闇の戦士か？」って……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000660_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)And he says, “No, I'm a Warrior of Light.” And that was it. Buggered off as quick as he came.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000660_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-勇ましい衛兵-)そしたら一言、「自分は光の戦士だ」と。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000670_ALPHINAUD<tab>A Warrior of <var 1A 02 /var>Light<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000670_ALPHINAUD<tab>光の、戦士だって……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000680_SOLDIER03608<tab>Why would someone go around calling himself that, though? It was those bastards who caused the Flood.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000680_SOLDIER03608おい……いくら強くたって、「光の戦士」と言えば、
光の氾濫を引き起こした大罪人だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000690_SOLDIER03608<tab>I mean, if you were going to pretend to be anyone, it'd be <var 1A 02 /var><var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var><var 1A 01 /var>─the Warrior of Darkness!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000690_SOLDIER03608それより、こちらのお方こそ、この世界を救ってくれた、
本物の「闇の戦士」様だぞ……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000700_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)Eh? Oh! I─ I didn't know! It's an honor!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000700_BRAVESOLDIER(-勇ましい衛兵-)こっ、これは失礼いたしました！
お目にかかれて、光栄でありますッ！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000710_LYNA<tab>Since the eater is no longer a threat, our work here is done. Return to your posts.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000710_LYNAさて、標的であったはぐれ罪喰いが倒された以上、
今回の討伐任務は、これで終了となります。
各自、持ち場に戻るように。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000720_SOLDIER03608<tab>I had hoped to fight at your side today... But I'll continue to follow your example─and may we meet again!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000720_SOLDIER03608あなたと共闘できなくて残念です。
これからも、「闇の戦士」様を師表に精進します。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000730_LYNA<tab>I apologize for the wasted journey. It seems I overestimated the threat.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000730_LYNA結果、無駄足を踏ませてしまい、申し訳ありません。
それにしても、「光の戦士」を名乗る者の正体が、
気になるところです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000740_LYNA<tab>As for this “Warrior of Light”... I do not know who would be brazen enough to take that mantle for his own. Whatever it may once have meant, it is forever tainted by the association with the Flood.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000740_LYNA先ほどの彼らもそうでしたが……もとの意味はどうであれ、
「光の戦士」と言えばアルバートたちを想像する者が大勢です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000750_LYNA<tab>The Exarch told me the truth of Ardbert and his comrades' deeds, and I am aware they played some part in your own triumph. But to most, they are synonymous with the calamity that befell this world.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000750_LYNA私は水晶公から、彼らの行いがあってこその今なのだと……
あなたの勝利にも何か関与していたのだと伝え聞いていますが、
そんな認識はまだ人々に浸透していないはず……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000760_LYNA<tab>Still, if this man is minded to destroy sin eaters, I may forgive him his unfortunate choice of alias.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000760_LYNA何者であろうと、はぐれ罪喰いを倒してくれるだけならば、
むしろ感謝すべきなのでしょうが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000770_LYNA<tab>But that is neither here nor there. I thank you for accompanying me.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000770_LYNA<tab>ともかく、ここまでご足労いただきありがとうございました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000780_ALPHINAUD<tab>With that concluded, shall we return to the Crystarium? There is a proposal I should like to make...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000780_ALPHINAUDそれでは、我々はクリスタリウムに戻るとしようか。
ちょっと、私から提案したいことがあるんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000790_LYNA<tab>Forgive me. There is one more thing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000790_LYNA<tab>あ……申し訳ありません、もうひとつ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000800_LYNA<tab>A personal concern of mine. I had hoped you might have a moment to speak privately.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000800_LYNA今度は、あなたに個人的にお話ししたいことがあるのです。
少しだけよろしいでしょうか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000810_ALPHINAUD<tab>Take your time. I shall go on ahead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000810_ALPHINAUD<tab>では、私は先に星見の間に戻っているよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000820_LYNA<tab>I will not mince words. This matter concerns the Exarch.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000820_LYNA呼び止めてしまってすみません。
お話ししたいのは、水晶公のことです……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000830_LYNA<tab>Though his countenance belies his age, his demeanor never has. He has seen more than any man should, and grown ever more weary with time...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000830_LYNAご存じのように、公は外見上は歳をとることがありません。
それでも永く生きているだけあって、
時折、老人のように感じることがあるのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000840_LYNA<tab>But I see I give the wrong impression. While it is true he attempted to open a letter with his salmon fillet the other evening, we are not here because I suspect his mind is deteriorating.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000840_LYNAああいえ、出不精だとか覇気がないという話ではなく。
魚をペーパーナイフと勘違いした事件についてでもなくて……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000850_LYNA<tab>Nor do I believe him to be so maddeningly unconcerned by the prospect of his own death as he once was. Indeed, the opposite is true.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000850_LYNA……そう、公はどこか死を悟っているかのような、
諦観しているところがあったんです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000860_LYNA<tab>It is for this reason that I seek your advice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000860_LYNA<tab>それがですね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000870_LYNA<tab>Since he returned from the Tempest, the Exarch is...not as he was.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000870_LYNAあなた方とテンペストから帰還して以来、
なんだか、とても……若々しくなった気がするのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000880_LYNA<tab>He seems a different man. A <var 1A 02 /var>younger<var 1A 01 /var> man.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000880_LYNAとくにここ最近は……
皆さんと何か、研究をしているのですよね？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000890_LYNA<tab>I know not the details of his research, but when I saw him at work recently, there was a glint in his eye that I had never seen before. He looked <var 1A 02 /var>happy<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000890_LYNAたまたま調べものをしている姿を見かけたのですが、
その眼差しは、さながら無邪気な少年そのもの。
まだ見ぬ未来に向けられているように感じられました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000900_LYNA<tab>It was as if he had peered into the future, and for the first time, found joy there.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000900_LYNAそんな公の変化が、私はとても嬉しいのです。
まるで憑き物が落ちたように、生き生きとし始めたことが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000910_LYNA<tab>Though it gladdens me to see him thus, I wonder if I should not keep my distance. I fear that my presence will only anchor him to the past. Remind him of all the pain that came before.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000910_LYNAだからこそ、以前の公と関わりの深い自分は、
近づかない方がいいのではないかと……
邪魔になってしまうのではと、思っておりまして……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Anchors keep us where we have chosen to be.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>邪魔にはならないと思う

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>He's lost without you, you know. And he misses you already.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>寂しそうにしていたぞ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000920_LYNA<tab>...Is that so?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000920_LYNA<tab>ほ、本当ですか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000930_LYNA<tab>He─ Are you sure?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000930_LYNA公が！？
それは、本当ですか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000940_LYNA<tab>Then perhaps we might remain as we were. As we have always been.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000940_LYNAよかった……。
だとしたら、いままでと変わりなく接していいのですね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000950_LYNA<tab>What a relief.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000950_LYNAあなたにこの気持ちを打ち明けて正解でした。
どうもありがとうございます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000960_LYNA<tab>In that case, I will have to speak with him about the amount of time he is spending at work.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000960_LYNAただ、ひとつだけ心配なのは、
公が研究に打ち込みすぎて、身体を壊さないかということ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000970_LYNA<tab>This research is important, I know, but if he refuses to consider his own health, I will have to consider it for him.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000970_LYNAどれほど若く見えようとも、
私にとっては「おじいちゃん」ですからね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000980_ALPHINAUD<tab>Yes, this looks to be nearly everyone. Let us begin, shall we?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000980_ALPHINAUDこれで、みんな集まったみたいだね。
それでは、そろそろ始めようか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000990_ALPHINAUD<tab>Though I am usually the first to hold forth at such events, I think, on this occasion, that honor should fall to you.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_000990_ALPHINAUDこういうときは、いつも私が前に出てしまうが、
ここは「闇の戦士」である、君の口から語られるべきだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001000_YSHTOLA<tab>They <var 1A 02 /var>would<var 1A 01 /var> be more inclined to take the word of the Warrior of Darkness.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001000_YSHTOLA賛成よ。
クリスタリウムの民には、
「闇の戦士」であるあなたの言葉こそ響くはず。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001010_URIANGER<tab>Indeed. In light of the subject matter, who better than thee to speak these truths?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001010_URIANGER異論はございません。
「光の戦士たち」の真実は、同じく「光の戦士」でもある、
あなたによって語られるのが、道理と言えましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001020_SOLDIER03608<tab>Wicked white... The Warriors of Light did all that?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001020_SOLDIER03608これが……
「光の戦士たち」の真実だと言うのか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001030_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)So they never─ I mean, they only ever wanted to help? And when everything they'd done turned to ash, they <var 1A 02 /var>still<var 1A 01 /var> carried on...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001030_BRAVESOLDIER(-勇ましい衛兵-)なんてことだ……。
光の氾濫のきっかけを作ったことには変わりなくとも、
そのあとの行いを思うと……俺は……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001040_SOLDIER03608<tab>They gave everything to stop the Flood... First their lives, then their souls...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001040_SOLDIER03608ああ……。
自ら命を絶って異世界に渡り、救済の方法を探したり……
戻ってきたその魂が、氾濫を食い止めてくれたり……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001050_SOLDIER03608<tab>And they managed it, too─in the end. They <var 1A 02 /var>saved<var 1A 01 /var> us. And we cursed their names.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001050_SOLDIER03608……馬鹿だったのは、自分たちだったのかもしれない。
何も知らず、ただ蔑むようなことを言って……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001060_ALPHINAUD<tab>This should go a long way towards clearing the air.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001060_ALPHINAUDこれで、彼らに着せられた汚名も、
徐々にそそがれていくことだろう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001070_ALPHINAUD<tab>Impossible...!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001070_ALPHINAUD<tab>あれは……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You can see him too?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>アルフィノにも見えるのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I take it I'm not imagining this, then.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>みんなに姿が見えている？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001080_ALPHINAUD<tab>I definitely see <var 1A 02 /var>something<var 1A 01 /var>. You don't think it's a ghost, do you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001080_ALPHINAUDあ、ああ、私にも見えているが……
まさか、ゆ、幽霊……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001090_URIANGER<tab>Nay. Yonder standeth no bloodless apparition, but a Warrior of Light and Darkness both. Ardbert.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001090_URIANGERこの私にも、しかと見えております。
確かにあの姿は、かつて我らと対峙した「闇の戦士」。
そして、この世界の「光の戦士」である、アルバート……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001100_YSHTOLA<tab>What in the world...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001100_YSHTOLA<tab>いったい、どういうことなの……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001110_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)It's you! The one who slew the eater...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001110_BRAVESOLDIER(-勇ましい衛兵-)あ、あなたは……
さっき、はぐれ罪喰いを倒した……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001120_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)That it should be the Warrior of Darkness who brought the truth to light... You've saved me a fair bit of time─though I have a few words of my own to say, if I may.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001120_DUMMYARDBERT(-アルバートの顔を持つ男-)まさか「闇の戦士」が、
俺たち「光の戦士」の真実を語ってくれていたとはな。
話が早くて助かるが、ここからは俺が引き継ごう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001130_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)People of the Crystarium! I am Ardbert, one of those you know as a Warrior of Light.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001130_DUMMYARDBERT(-アルバートの顔を持つ男-)クリスタリウムの民よ……
俺が「光の戦士」、アルバートだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001140_SOLDIER03608<tab>That's impossible! You should be dead...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001140_SOLDIER03608そ、そんなバカな……。
たったいま、あなたはずっと前に死んだって……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001150_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)Aye, that I should. But as the world has been given new life, so too have I.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001150_DUMMYARDBERT(-アルバートを騙る男-)ああ、そのとおりだ。
だが、「闇の戦士たち」により世界が真の姿を取り戻したことで、
俺は……俺だけは蘇ることができたんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001160_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)I know not why I, and I alone, have been gifted this chance. But I do know this: only by the will of the star itself could such a miracle come to pass.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001160_DUMMYARDBERT(-アルバートを騙る男-)これも、光の意志によるもの。
俺は託されたのさ、新たな「光の戦士」を覚醒させる使命を！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001170_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)The hero who stands before you now─the Warrior of Darkness─is not of this world. And the day will come when <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> must return to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> home.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001170_DUMMYARDBERT(-アルバートを騙る男-)彼ら「闇の戦士たち」は、この世界の英雄ではない。
かつて俺たちが渡った、異世界の住人。
従って、いずれもとの世界に帰っていく。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001180_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)But this land is <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> home. And if it is to remain so, now and forevermore, it is <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> who must protect it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001180_DUMMYARDBERT(-アルバートを騙る男-)だからこそ、この世界は、
お前たち自身の手で護ってゆかなければならない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001190_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)The time to rely on saviors from afar has passed. It is <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> who must rise. <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> who must become the new Warriors of Light!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001190_DUMMYARDBERT(-アルバートを騙る男-)もう英雄に頼っていた時代は終わるんだ。
お前たち自身が新たな英雄に……
「光の戦士」となるべく、立ち上がる時だ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001200_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-Gallant Guardsman-)Wha─ Us? Warriors of Light?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001200_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>(-勇ましい衛兵-)お、俺たちが……「光の戦士」だって！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001210_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)None of us were born heroes, my friend. I was only ever a man with a thirst for adventure.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001210_DUMMYARDBERT(-アルバートを騙る男-)どんな英雄だって、何も特別なわけじゃない。
俺だって、一介の冒険者に過ぎなかったんだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001220_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)But wherever my journeys took me, I was invariably confronted with the same choice: to lend what aid I could to those in need─or not. And I always chose the former.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001220_DUMMYARDBERT(-アルバートを騙る男-)それが、旅先で人助けをしているうちに、
いつの間にか、「光の戦士」だなんて呼ばれ始めた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001230_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)Any one of you could do the same. All you need is the will to help your fellow man, and the resolve to see it through.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001230_DUMMYARDBERT(-アルバートを騙る男-)ここにいる誰もが、「光の戦士」になる可能性を秘めているんだ。
重要なのは、この世界と人のために立ち上がろうとする意志だ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001240_URIANGER<tab>From thine own lips did we learn of Ardbert's fate, and by thy countenance, I gather thou art not inclined to recant thy testimony.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001240_URIANGERアルバートの魂が最後にどうなったのかは、
テンペストでの戦いのあと、あなたから伺いました。
ですが、「彼」はこうして目の前にあり、正論を語っている。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001250_URIANGER<tab>Yet whosoever this man may be, his words hold truth─and resonate with the citizenry besides. For us to voice our doubts here and now would serve but to sow disquiet. 'Twere better we retired unto the Ocular, and there discussed this matter in private.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001250_URIANGERここで異論を唱えては、市民たちを混乱させるだけ……。
一度、星見の間で話し合うことにしましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001260_ALPHINAUD<tab>Go. I will stay here and watch.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001260_ALPHINAUD私は残って、彼を監視しておこう。
必要とあらば、その動向を追うことにするよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001270_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>So that is a Warrior of Light of the First.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001270_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>なるほど、あれが第一世界の「光の戦士」。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001271_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>I have not had the pleasure of making his acquaintance, but as you all seem to be in agreement, I gather this is no simple case of mistaken identity.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001271_MYSTERYVOICE私は初めて見るが、会ったことのあるあなた方なら、
見間違うということもないだろう……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001280_BEQLUGG<tab>As far as I was able to discern, that was indeed Ardbert. It has been a long time, but not that long. Could he truly have been resurrected as he claims?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001280_BEQLUGGワシはかつて彼らと交流があったが、
確かにあの男は、どう見てもアルバートだ。
まさか、本当に蘇ったというのか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>...<var 1A 02 /var>No<var 1A 01 /var>. Absolutely not.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>蘇るなんてあり得ない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It looks like him and sounds like him. But it <var 1A 02 /var>isn't<var 1A 01 /var> him.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>あれは……アルバートじゃない！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001290_URIANGER<tab>Ardbert did entrust his very soul unto thee. I see no reason to question thy judgment.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001290_URIANGERおっしゃるとおりです。
アルバートの魂は、エメトセルクとの戦いの際、
あなたに託されたのですから……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001300_YSHTOLA<tab>Nor I. To my eyes, your aether burns as brightly as the day you slew Emet-Selch. That is proof that he is with you still.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001300_YSHTOLAええ、今もあなたの魂の強い輝きが視えているわ……
彼がともにあるという証でしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001310_URIANGER<tab>Yet that which standeth now before the people is far more than a passing imitation. I am reminded of the Cardinal Virtues...though a sin eater he is not.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001310_URIANGERアルバートは復活し得ない……しかし事実としてここにいる。
少し前に話題になった「四使徒」とも似てはいますが、
彼は罪喰いであるとも思えませんでした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001320_URIANGER<tab>Which leaveth but one plausible explanation.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001320_URIANGER<tab>なればこの状況、あるいはまた……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001330_YSHTOLA<tab>That he is an Ascian.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001330_YSHTOLA<tab>アシエン、ということ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001340_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Given their fondness for posthumous possession, I would have to agree.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001340_MYSTERYVOICEふむ……。
確かに、アシエンが肉体を利用しているという線はあり得る。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001350_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>From what I understand, the Warriors of Light were laid to rest in Eulmore by those whom they had aided in life. At the time, some few still remembered them as heroes.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001350_MYSTERYVOICE「光の戦士たち」の遺体は、彼らに救われた人々の手で、
ユールモア領に埋葬されたと聞いたことがある。
大罪人、と呼ばれるようになる前の話だ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001360_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Needless to say, four of them were subsequently exhumed to serve as the Virtues. And if one knew where to look, Ardbert too would not have been difficult to find.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001360_MYSTERYVOICEそれらのうち、アルバート以外の者たちの遺体は、
何者かによって再生され、罪喰い「四使徒」となり果てていた。
つまり、残る彼の遺体だけがアシエンに利用されたということか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001370_YSHTOLA<tab>Assuming then that this is indeed the work of an Ascian, my mind inevitably turns to the last remaining Paragon to survive the sundering...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001370_YSHTOLAアシエンの仕業だとしたら、
残るオリジナルはあとひとり……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001380_URIANGER<tab>Elidibus.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001380_URIANGER<tab>アシエン・エリディブス。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001390_URIANGER<tab>That Zenos hath reclaimed his own flesh is known.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001390_URIANGERあなたがもたらした報告によれば、
ゼノスは彼から己が肉体を取り戻したと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001400_URIANGER<tab>Thus evicted from his borrowed form...and cognizant, no doubt, of Emet-Selch's failure here in the First...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001400_URIANGERということは、かの白き調停者はもはや、
ガレマール帝国皇太子に扮しているわけではない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001410_URIANGER<tab>'Tis quite possible the emissary chose Ardbert for his next vessel.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001410_URIANGERエメトセルクも失った今、次なる一手として、
アルバートとなって、行動を開始した……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001420_BEQLUGG<tab>Inhabiting the flesh of the fallen... My, that is unsavory. And they do this often, you say?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001420_BEQLUGG遺体を利用するとは、おぞましい……。
いつもそんなことをしておる連中なのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001430_URIANGER<tab>Verily, for they possess no corporeal forms of their own. In what one may term their natural state, none save those gifted with the Echo can perceive them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001430_URIANGERそれがアシエンというもの。
肉体を持たない彼らの実体は、その存在を「認識」されないと、
人に見られることすら叶わないのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001440_URIANGER<tab>Indeed, when Elidibus intruded upon the Waking Sands, his presence did go unmarked by all save Minfilia and the Warrior of Light.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001440_URIANGERエリディブスが「砂の家」に現れたとき、
その姿を捉えられたのは、ミンフィリアと、我らが英雄のみ。
私は気配程度しか、感じ取ることができませんでした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001450_URIANGER<tab>On that occasion, I myself remained ignorant of his coming until after his departure.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001450_URIANGERおそらく、「超える力」の持ち主でもなければ、
アシエンの不確かな存在を、「認識」することは難しい……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001460_URIANGER<tab>'Twas only at a later juncture, when he deigned to appear before me in borrowed flesh that I was finally able to take the measure of him.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001460_URIANGERそれゆえに、彼らが人の歴史に介入する際には、
他者の肉体をまとっているものと推測されます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001470_URIANGER<tab>In such puppetry do the Ascians engage when they seek to influence the course of history.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001470_URIANGERかつて、エリディブスが私に接触してきた際も、
きっと誰かの肉体を用いていたのでしょう。
アリゼー様やサンクレッドにも視認されておりましたので。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001480_YSHTOLA<tab>And they have gained much by it. Emet-Selch single-handedly built the Garlean Empire in this manner, while Lahabrea came close to conquering Eorzea having taken possession of Thancred's living body.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001480_YSHTOLAラハブレアがサンクレッドを利用し、
エメトセルクがガレアン人の肉体でソル帝を演じた……
それと同じことね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001490_URIANGER<tab>Yet it must needs be noted that the Ascians cannot avail themselves of <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> mortal vessels. For were they able to do so, none would serve as a better pawn than our own redoubtable champion.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001490_URIANGERしかし、どの肉体にでも、というわけではないようです。
なぜならば、我らが英雄に憑依することこそ、
彼らにとって最善の策であるはず。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001500_URIANGER<tab>Mayhap the blessing of Light shieldeth Hydaelyn's chosen from Ascian influence. Or mayhap other forces are at work. We cannot say for certain.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001500_URIANGERそれをしない、あるいはできないということは……。
憑依が光の加護によって阻まれるのか、
何か別の理由があるのか、定かではありませんが。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001510_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Whatever the reason, I hope it holds true. I dare not contemplate what might come to pass otherwise.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001510_MYSTERYVOICEそんなことをされてしまったら大変だ。
とても敵う相手じゃなくなってしまうだろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001520_YSHTOLA<tab>Is it not peculiar, then, that Ardbert's mortal remains should be susceptible, given that he was once a Warrior of Light? Or did the final departure of his soul make it possible, perhaps?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001520_YSHTOLAアルバートは、かつて「光の戦士」だった……。
でも、今やその魂もなく、遺体だけが残されていた。
それが今回、肉体を利用できた理由ってところかしら？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001530_YSHTOLA<tab>Regardless, to hear an Ascian use him to call forth new Warriors of Light boggles the mind.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001530_YSHTOLAただ、人々に「光の戦士」を目指せだなんて、
アシエンの台詞にしては、冗談が効きすぎているわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001540_URIANGER<tab>Elidibus hath ever been an enigma, his ostensible purpose being to preserve the balance between Light and Dark.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001540_URIANGER光と闇の均衡を保つ調停者、白き衣に身を包み、
オリジナルと呼ばれる最後のひとり、アシエン・エリディブス。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001550_URIANGER<tab>When he made overtures towards me, however, I was afforded a glimpse behind the mask of the self-appointed emissary.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001550_URIANGER<tab>かつて私は、エリディブスと言葉を交わしました……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001560_URIANGER<tab>I shall not defend mine actions, undertaken in pursuit of a better understanding of our foe, as either wise or prudent.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001560_URIANGER世界の分断と統合の真実を知り、
私は彼の策を逆手に取ろうと目論んだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001570_URIANGER<tab>Nevertheless, what little I did glean may now prove useful.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001570_URIANGERあのときの独断は、決して褒められたものではない愚行なれど、
エリディブスのことを知れたのは幸いでした。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001580_URIANGER<tab>Elidibus possesseth a subtle mind, practiced in the art of manipulation. That he coaxed this star's most valiant heroes as far as the Source with naught save half-truths is no trifling feat.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001580_URIANGERその印象を言い表すとすれば、「狡猾なる策士」。
彼は言葉巧みにアルバートらに命を捨てさせ、
原初世界にまで導くことに成功し、己が策に利用したのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001590_URIANGER<tab>And now, I believe, he doth employ his skills once more to some as-yet-unknown end. Though naught is certain, should my suspicions prove true, we shall have need of all our wits if we are to uncover─and thereafter thwart─his plot.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001590_URIANGER此度も、人々を扇動しているのは、
何らかの策を弄しているからにほかなりません。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001600_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Agreed. 'Tis plain that simply speaking out against him will not avail us. At best, it would only serve to confuse the people.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001600_MYSTERYVOICEさりとて、ここで表立って彼を否定しては、
「光の戦士たち」の真実を知ったばかりの民を混乱させてしまう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001610_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>And I would hesitate to do anything which might tarnish Ardbert's reputation once more, nor yours by association.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001610_MYSTERYVOICEそれに、アルバートに魂まで託されたあなたのことだ。
彼らに再び嫌疑がかかることは望むまい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001620_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>That being the case, it may be wise to keep a covert eye on this “Ardbert's” movements as we attempt to discern his purpose and how best to mitigate his influence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001620_MYSTERYVOICEだとすれば、今はまだ大掛かりに警戒を敷かず、
静かに動向を追うことにしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001630_BEQLUGG<tab>His performance appears to have concluded. What now─go back out and follow him?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001630_BEQLUGGむ、あやつ、演説を終えたようだぞ。
このまま黙って見過ごすのか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001640_URIANGER<tab>'Twould appear Master Alphinaud already hath pursuit in mind, and I suspect one pair of eyes shall better serve our cause than half a dozen. Let the rest of us maintain an inconspicuous distance─for the present, at least.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001640_URIANGERアルフィノ様が尾行を行うご様子……
ひとまずはあの方に、お任せすることにしましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001650_ALMET<tab>Come. Our new discoveries are to be found this way.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001650_ALMET<tab>新たな遺跡は、この階段を降りた先だ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001660_YSHTOLA<tab>The people of Ronka are known to have venerated animals, but these features do not match those of any indigenous species. This is no common beast.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001660_YSHTOLAずいぶんと、大きな石像ね。
ロンカでは様々な動物を神獣として崇めていたはずだけど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001670_YSHTOLA<tab>Though that much is plain from its proportions.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001670_YSHTOLA<tab>これはどう見ても、普通の動物じゃないわね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001680_CYMET<tab>Lifelike, is it not? One could almost imagine it breathed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001680_CYMETとっても迫力がありますねぇ。
なんだか、生きてるみたいですぅ～。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001690_UIMET<tab>Grrr!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001690_UIMET<tab>ガウッ……！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001700_CYMET<tab>Aaah!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001700_CYMET<tab>きゃあぁ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001710_UIMET<tab>Hahaha!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001710_UIMET<tab>アハハハハッ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001711_CYMET<tab>Why, you...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001711_CYMET<tab>ちょっとぉ～！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001720_YSHTOLA<tab>This owl, by contrast, seems no different from the others we've seen.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001720_YSHTOLAそして……
こちらは、お馴染みのフクロウの石像ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001730_ALMET<tab>The sealed door lies ahead.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001730_ALMET<tab>閉ざされた扉はこの奥にある……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001740_ALMET<tab>As you see, one statue is missing. I expect we are meant to replace it, as before.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001740_ALMET見てのとおり、
片方の台座にだけ、フクロウの石像が置かれている。
以前のように、空いた台座に石像を運ぶという試練だろうか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001750_YSHTOLA<tab>Too simple. There will be some additional defense mechanism.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001750_YSHTOLAそれにしては、単純すぎるわ。
一見すると妨害する機構もなさそうだし……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001760_YSHTOLA<tab>Just a moment─there are words carved into the stone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001760_YSHTOLA待って、ここにロンカ文字が刻まれているわ……。
えーと……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001770_YSHTOLA<tab>He...who would disturb...a hero's deserved slumber...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001770_YSHTOLA<tab>汝……英雄の……眠り……妨げるは…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001780_YSHTOLA<tab>Shall instead...waken the beast...and know...his folly...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001780_YSHTOLA封印されし……神獣……
呼び起こすと……知れ…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001790_YSHTOLA<tab>Wait! Don't!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001790_YSHTOLA<tab>ちょっ、待ちなさい……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001800_UIMET<tab>Wh-What? But I only─ What is happening!?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001800_UIMETえ……ええ？
なになに……何が起こってんの……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001810_CYMET<tab>Oh no... Oh no, no, no... I-It lives!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001810_CYMET大変ですぅ～！
やっぱりこれ、生きてますぅ～！！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001820_YSHTOLA<tab>Why am I not surprised? Prepare yourselves!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001820_YSHTOLAまったく！
こうなったら、やるしかないようね……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001830_YSHTOLA<tab>'Twould seem the magicks have returned us. How polite.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001830_YSHTOLA<tab>ふう……元の部屋に戻ってこられたようね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001840_YSHTOLA<tab>Now, what have we learned?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001840_YSHTOLAあなたのおかげで、
とんだ試練を受けさせられたわ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001850_UIMET<tab>Oh, we were bound to run into a living statue eventually. And now we can open the door!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001850_UIMETまーまー！
これで扉の封印も解けるんだし、結果オーライだ！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001860_YSHTOLA<tab>“He who would disturb a hero's deserved slumber...”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001860_YSHTOLAさて、『汝、英雄の眠り妨げるは』とのことだったわね。
大体、見当はついているけど、果たして……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001870_YSHTOLA<tab>A tomb, just as I thought. Befitting a hero.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001870_YSHTOLAやっぱり、ここは霊廟だったようね。
埋葬されているのは、おそらく古代ロンカ帝国の英雄……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001880_ALMET<tab>She is Viis! Could it be the archmage Tiuna?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001880_ALMETあの壁画に描かれているのは……ヴィース族の魔道士？
まさか、「大魔道士チュナ」の墓だというのか……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001890_ALMET<tab>A legendary hero of Ronka, as you surmised. The tales tell of how she smote entire armies with a single incantation, so potent was her spellcraft─though she ever fought in the name of peace.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001890_ALMETとても高名な、ロンカ時代の英雄だ。
その魔法は神の如く強大で、悪しき軍勢を蹴散らし、
平和をもたらしたという。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001900_UIMET<tab>I thought them no more than tales. To think she really existed...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001900_UIMETてっきり、おとぎ話だと思っていたけど、
本当に存在したんだね、チュナって……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001910_CYMET<tab>Well, I for one always believed!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001910_CYMET<tab>わ、私は信じてましたぁ～！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001920_YSHTOLA<tab>I wonder...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001920_YSHTOLA<tab>これは……まさか……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001930_YSHTOLA<tab>By the light...of fallen stars...great power awakens...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001930_YSHTOLA星の……雨が降り……
英雄……大いなる力に……覚醒せん…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001940_ALMET<tab>Tiuna was not only a master of spellcraft. It is said she could see truths long lost and hear the voices of men's hearts.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001940_ALMET言い伝えによると、大魔道士チュナは、
「真実を見抜く眼」や「心の声を聞きとる耳」を持っていたそうだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001950_YSHTOLA<tab>Naught less than the Echo.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001950_YSHTOLA<tab>それが事実なら、間違いなく「超える力」ね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001960_YSHTOLA<tab>In which case...none of this is mere coincidence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001960_YSHTOLAだとすれば……なんてこと……。
すべては、偶然ではないのかもしれない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001970_YSHTOLA<tab>A shower of stars setting the sky aflame─and in both this world and the Source, we find individuals within whom a mysterious power awakened at the sight.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001970_YSHTOLA世界に降り注ぐ星の雨。
「流星雨」を見た者は、異能に目覚める。
それは、原初世界でもたびたび報告されている事象なの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001980_YSHTOLA<tab>We could never unpick the why of it. Now, however...I believe we might.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001980_YSHTOLAその理屈はようとして知れなかったけれど、
ひとつ、仮説を立てることができそうだわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001990_YSHTOLA<tab>Does the scene depicted here not resemble the one we saw when we first ventured into the Qitana Ravel?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_001990_YSHTOLAここに描かれた流星雨の絵……
キタンナ神影洞で見た、終末の壁画に似ていなくて？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002000_YSHTOLA<tab>Moreover, does it not recall that which Emet-Selch invited us to witness in Amaurot?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002000_YSHTOLAあるいは、エメトセルクが見せた終末の光景に……。
あなたも、世界を焼き尽くす、無数の流星を見たはずよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002010_YSHTOLA<tab>The Final Days.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002010_YSHTOLA水晶公たちが作ってくれているソウル・サイフォン然り、
魂と記憶というのは、密接にして繊細な関係を持っている……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002020_YSHTOLA<tab>If, as the Exarch's research suggests, soul and mind share a fragile yet profound bond, might it not be possible for an event to leave such a deep imprint upon the soul that it could be perceived eons later─given a suitable trigger?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002020_YSHTOLA私たちの魂のどこかに、
遠い過去に見た終末の風景が焼き付いていたとしたら……
それに似た流星雨を見たときに、何かしらの反応があるのかも。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002030_YSHTOLA<tab>The Echo defies explanation by conventional aetherological theory. Or shall we say, modern aetherological theory.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002030_YSHTOLAそうね……そうだわ……「超える力」については、
未だエーテル学的な解明がなされていない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002040_YSHTOLA<tab>But if it is a power that once belonged to the ancients, to souls yet undivided...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002040_YSHTOLAだとすれば、終末の想起によって発露する、
人が分断される前の……
古代人だったころの力という可能性も……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002045_YSHTOLA<tab>...Ah.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002045_YSHTOLA<tab>ハッ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002050_YSHTOLA<tab>It would seem I have entered the realm of pure speculation. And I call myself a scholar.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002050_YSHTOLAごめんなさい、私としたことが、
何の根拠もない憶測を語りすぎたわ。
エーテル学を修める者として、あるまじきことね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002060_YSHTOLA<tab>I shall refrain from making any further wild claims until such time as I have evidence.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002060_YSHTOLAなんとか、この説を裏付ける証拠が欲しいところだけど、
それはここで見つかるものじゃない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002070_YSHTOLA<tab>Still, I cannot choose but be reminded of our experience in Amaurot...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002070_YSHTOLAただ、この壁画を見ていたら、あの幻影都市で目にした、
終末を思い出してしまったというのは本当よ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Then you must recall Emet-Selch's dying request.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>エメトセルクは、「覚えていろ」と言った

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I will not soon forget it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>あの光景は忘れられない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002080_YSHTOLA<tab>“Remember us.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002080_YSHTOLAそう、エメトセルクは最後に、
彼らが生きていたことを「覚えていろ」と言ったわ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002090_ALMET<tab>“History is learned, not lived.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002090_ALMET我ら護り手が遺跡を護ってきたように、
ロンカは過去から受け継がれたものを大切にしていた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002100_ALMET<tab>We have always protected the tales of Ronka, just as we have protected this place. But we are mindful of what our mothers taught us.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002100_ALMETしかし、だからこそ、戒めを込めた、
「過去を明かす者、ときの者に非ず」という諺を持つ。
その意味はこうだ……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002110_ALMET<tab>We see the past through our own eyes, and speak of it with our own words. Thus do we come to understand it, in our own way. But this is not the same as remembering.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002110_ALMET過去を読み解いたつもりでいても、
読み解いているのが今を生きる者である以上、
今の観点や願望が必ず入る、ということ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002120_YSHTOLA<tab>Your mothers were wise.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002120_YSHTOLA<tab>確かに、一理あるわね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002130_YSHTOLA<tab>Though we witnessed the Final Days, our impressions could not fail to be colored by our own experiences and expectations. Those who lived through it would have perceived the event quite differently.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002130_YSHTOLA私たちは幻影都市で「終末」を目にしたけれど……
そこで感じたことには、私たちの常識や思想による影響が、
少なからず入っていたはず……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002140_YSHTOLA<tab>We must bear in mind that it is no simple matter to keep the truth alive, or it will die with Emet-Selch and his kin.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002140_YSHTOLAエメトセルクが護っていた真実を正しく継いでいくのは、
存外難しいことなのかもしれないわ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002150_YSHTOLA<tab>But we have disturbed Tiuna long enough. Fanow will serve similarly well as a venue for our contemplations.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002150_YSHTOLAさて、これ以上、ロンカの英雄の眠りを妨げるのも悪いわね。
そろそろ、ファノヴの里に戻りましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002160_THANCRED<tab>If you were hoping to vent your frustrations on our eater friend here, I can only apologize.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002160_THANCRED<tab>ああ……はぐれ罪喰いなら、片付けておいたぞ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002170_RYNE<tab>Few as they are now, it took us no time at all to track it down.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002170_RYNE以前と比べると、罪喰いの数も減っていますから……
すぐに見つけることができました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002180_ALPHINAUD<tab>That suits our purpose perfectly. Now we need only wait for Ardbert to arrive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002180_ALPHINAUD<tab>これで、あとはアルバートを騙る者を待つばかりだね……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002190_ALISAIE<tab>Weren't you two meant to be attending to the Empty?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002190_ALISAIEそういえば……サンクレッドたちは、
「無の大地」の調査をしてるんじゃなかった？
そっちはよかったの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002200_THANCRED<tab>We were, and are. But we can hardly ignore the rest of the world, so we thought we might see how things were coming along. From what we can gather, the answer is “strangely.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002200_THANCREDまだ調査中ではあるが、こっちも尋常じゃない事態だからな。
一旦、中断してでも力を貸すさ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002210_THANCRED<tab>We were indeed, and we've made a certain amount of progress. So we thought we might see how the rest of the world was getting on. From what we can gather, the answer is “strangely.”
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002210_THANCRED無の大地の調査は順調に進んでいる。
となれば、優先すべきはこちらの問題だろう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002220_RYNE<tab>Right now, we think we can do more good here.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002220_RYNE私も、皆さんのお役に立てればと……
サンクレッドについてきました。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002230_YSHTOLA<tab>It is heartening to have all present.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002230_YSHTOLA<tab>やっぱり、みんなが揃うと頼もしいわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002240_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed! We will be glad of the additional hands should matters escalate.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002240_ALPHINAUDああ、戦いの可能性が否定できない以上、
万全の布陣で臨みたいからね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002250_URIANGER<tab>Our quarry is come.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002250_URIANGER<tab>どうやら……目当ての者も現れたようです……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002260_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)Hah. It seems I've lost this particular race.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002260_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-アルバートを騙る男-)今度は、こっちが一足遅かったようだな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002270_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)Ah, though I suppose it's only fair.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002270_DUMMYARDBERT(-アルバートを騙る男-)なあ、思い出さないか？
俺たちが初めて出会ったときのことを……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002280_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)When we first met, it was I who outpaced you. Ravana, was it?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002280_DUMMYARDBERT(-アルバートを騙る男-)お前が倒すべき蛮神を、俺たちが先に倒しちまったよな。
「ラーヴァナ」とか言ったか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002290_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)But where are my manners? I wouldn't be here were it not for you, and I have yet to say a word of thanks!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002290_DUMMYARDBERT(-アルバートを騙る男-)そういや、まだ礼を言ってなかった。
俺はお前のおかげで蘇ることができたんだ。
本当にありがとな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you do?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>どうする？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Extend a friendly fist.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>黙って拳を突き出す

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ask whether he wishes Seto were here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>セトのこと、覚えているか？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002300_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)Arm giving you trouble? You should have it examined.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002300_DUMMYARDBERT(-アルバートを騙る男-)なんだ？
どうしたってんだよ……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002310_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-Ardbert-)Poor fellow. He will be sorely missed.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002310_DUMMYARDBERT(-アルバートを騙る男-)ああ、あいつはいい奴だった。
ずいぶんと経っちまったから、もう会えないのがな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Indeed...<var 1A 02 /var>Ardbert<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>お前はアルバートじゃない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I thought you were supposed to be good at this.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>お前は誰だ？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002320_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-“Ardbert”-)Very well. Let us forgo this pretense.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002320_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-アルバートを騙る男-)なるほど……茶番はやめろということか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002330_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-“Ardbert”-)Very well. Let us forgo this pretense.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002330_ELIDIBUS<tab>なるほど……茶番はやめろということか……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002340_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-“Ardbert”-)After all, it was never you that I needed to deceive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002340_DUMMYARDBERT<tab>(-アルバートを騙る男-)まあ、君たちを騙せるとは思っていなかったがな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002350_ELIDIBUS<tab>(-“Ardbert”-)After all, it was never you that I needed to deceive.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002350_ELIDIBUS<tab>まあ、君たちを騙せるとは思っていなかったがな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002360_ELIDIBUS<tab>Yes, it is I, Elidibus.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002360_ELIDIBUS私は、アシエン・エリディブス。
エメトセルクの再現した街を歩んだであろう君たちには、
こうも名乗れよう……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002370_ELIDIBUS<tab>Through your time in Emet-Selch's imitation of our home, I daresay you have gained a better understanding of my role since last we met. Not that it matters.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002370_ELIDIBUS<tab>真なる人を導きし、十四人委員会の調停者である……と。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002380_ALPHINAUD<tab>We understand your role, Emissary, but not your goal. What is it that you seek to achieve?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002380_ALPHINAUD<tab>聞かせてくれ……君の目的は何なんだ……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002390_ELIDIBUS<tab>I seek to enact the will of the Convocation, of course. If it helps you to think of me as but another Ascian, no different in nature or purpose from the rest, you are welcome to do so.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002390_ELIDIBUS調停者として、十四人委員会の決議を成し遂げること……
ほかのアシエンたちと同じだと思ってもらって構わない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002400_ALPHINAUD<tab>Once, I would have said your goal was destruction alone.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002400_ALPHINAUD<tab>……それを、ただの破壊活動とはもはや言うまい。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002410_ALPHINAUD<tab>Now I understand that you fight for something you love, just as we do.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002410_ALPHINAUD私たちも君たちも、それぞれに護りたい人々がいて、
だからこそ戦うのだと……あの海底で知ったからだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002420_ALPHINAUD<tab>Yet though we seem doomed to clash, I bid you consider Emet-Selch's final words.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002420_ALPHINAUDしかし、エリディブス……
せめて一度、ともに考えることはできないだろうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002430_ALPHINAUD<tab>“Remember that we once lived,” he said. Had he not seen some glimmer of hope in our kind, I do not believe he would have spoken thus.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002430_ALPHINAUDエメトセルクが最期に、彼に「覚えていろ」と……
己の歩みを、託してくれた意味を。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002440_ALPHINAUD<tab>“Remember that we once lived,” he said. Had he not seen some glimmer of hope in our kind, I do not believe he would have spoken thus.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002440_ALPHINAUDエメトセルクが最期に、彼女に「覚えていろ」と……
己の歩みを、託してくれた意味を。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002450_YSHTOLA<tab>None better understood your plight than he. His words must surely be worthy of your consideration.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002450_YSHTOLAそうね……。
あの人が辿り着いた結末は、あなたにだって、
何かを伝えようとしているのではなくて……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002460_ELIDIBUS<tab>Emet-Selch...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002460_ELIDIBUS<tab>エメトセルク…………。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002470_ELIDIBUS<tab>How very unlike you, to err so gravely.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002470_ELIDIBUS残念だよ……君らしくないことをしたものだ。
調停者として、それは棄却すべき思考だと言わざるを得ない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002480_ELIDIBUS<tab>That one should stray at the end of so onerous a path is understandable, but I had thought you above such weakness. Mayhap you thought the same. Would that I had been present to offer correction...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002480_ELIDIBUS宿願を達成するまでの長き道のりの中で、
誤った見識を持つ者がいれば、それを正すのも調停者の役目。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002490_ELIDIBUS<tab>But I shall do so now, as is my duty, and return all to its proper course.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002490_ELIDIBUSエメトセルクの抱いた考えが、
私たちの歩みを止めようとするものであるならば、
いかに彼の言葉でも、私はそれを認めない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002500_ELIDIBUS<tab>As for you... Look at yourselves. Look at your <var 1A 02 /var>history<var 1A 01 /var>. Look back one hundred short years, to how your greatest warriors were undone.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002500_ELIDIBUSそもそも、「なりそこない」の歴史を見てみろ。
100年前のアルバートたちのことですら、
都合よく解釈していたじゃないか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002510_ELIDIBUS<tab>And now? At but a word from me, you raise your hands in answer like the puppets you are.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002510_ELIDIBUSそして今、民は私の言葉ひとつで掌を返している。
エメトセルクのことだって、所詮は同じようなもの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002515_ELIDIBUS<tab>Naught has changed.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002515_ELIDIBUS<tab>ああ、お前たちは、いつもそうだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002520_ELIDIBUS<tab>You fail and you fail and you learn nothing─allow that which is most important to slip through your fumbling fingers like so many grains of sand. Again and again and <var 1A 02 /var>again<var 1A 01 /var>. And you would remember <var 1A 02 /var>us<var 1A 01 /var>? You do forget yourselves.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002520_ELIDIBUS忘れ、誤り、その小さな手から何もかも零し続けている。
そんな存在が、私たちの何を「覚えている」と言うのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002530_ELIDIBUS<tab>There is no common ground to be found between you and I. Nor do I require any.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002530_ELIDIBUS「なりそこない」であるお前たちと私たちの間には、
和解も、理解も有り得ない……その必要もない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002540_ELIDIBUS<tab>I have my duty.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002540_ELIDIBUS<tab>私はただ……己が役目を成し遂げるのみだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002550_YSHTOLA<tab>Wait!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002550_YSHTOLA<tab>待ちなさい……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002560_ALPHINAUD<tab>Well...we have confirmed the identity of our foe, at least. And 'tis safe to say his objective is the Rejoining.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002560_ALPHINAUD……思うところは多々あるが、ひとまず、
彼がエリディブスであることは確実となった。
そしてその目的が、世界の統合にあることも……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002570_ALISAIE<tab>But we still have no idea how playing the part of a Warrior of Light will further his cause, nor why he would spur others to do the same.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002570_ALISAIEでも、「光の戦士たち」の真実を広め、
人々を扇動している理由までは、わからずじまいだったわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002580_YSHTOLA<tab>Another visit to the Tempest may shed some light upon these mysteries.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002580_YSHTOLA<tab>……ねえ、もう一度、テンペストを訪れてみない？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002590_YSHTOLA<tab>Whether we are to exchange words or blows with Elidibus at our next meeting, the fact remains: we know too little.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002590_YSHTOLA今後、エリディブスと戦うにしろ、再び言葉を交わすにしろ……
現状では、まだ不確かなことが多すぎるわ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002600_YSHTOLA<tab>Ere our paths cross again, I would learn more of the world that once was─and of Elidibus himself.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002600_YSHTOLA彼らが取り戻そうとしている、分断前の世界についても……
そして、エリディブス自身のことについても……ね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002610_YSHTOLA<tab>In this, we would be best served going directly to his home, much as Emet-Selch came to ours.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002610_YSHTOLAだったら、私たちから近づくべきではないかしら。
……エメトセルクが、私たちにそうしたように。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002620_URIANGER<tab>Though I see the wisdom in thy suggestion, the Amaurot we visited is but a phantom born of Emet-Selch's memory. I fear it will teach us little that we do not already know.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002620_URIANGERしかし……
かの幻影都市は、終末を迎える前の消えゆく幻。
エメトセルクが我らに知らしめた以上の、情報があるとは……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002630_YSHTOLA<tab>I quite agree. Yet the ruins of the actual city remain unexplored.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002630_YSHTOLAアーモロートについては、その意見に同意するわ。
でも、幻ではない本物の遺構には調査の手が及んでいない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002640_YSHTOLA<tab>Given the vastness of the Tempest, I should not be surprised were there more such structures like to those in which the Ondo reside.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002640_YSHTOLAテンペストは広大よ。
オンド族が住居としていたような遺構が、
まだ遺っていたとしても、おかしくないと思うの。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>If there's aught to be learned, I want to know.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>自分も彼らについてもっと知りたい

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>For want of a better option...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>気は進まないが、仕方ない……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A7_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>As long as you don't make me do any more chores.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A7_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>お母さんに賛成です

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002650_YSHTOLA<tab>A <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> after my own heart.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002650_YSHTOLA<tab>……ええ、新たな事実が見つかるといいわね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002660_YSHTOLA<tab>Mayhap your skepticism will leaven my curiosity.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002660_YSHTOLAありがとう。
彼らについての調査は、やっぱりあなたと一緒でないと。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002670_YSHTOLA<tab>Keep that up and I'll send you to bed without supper.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002670_YSHTOLA<tab>あなた、それ……面白い冗談だと思っているの？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002680_ALPHINAUD<tab>Assuming we are all in agreement, then, I suggest we first pay a visit to the Ondo. If anyone can tell us where more ruins are to be found, it is them.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002680_ALPHINAUDだとしたら、まずは新たな遺構探しということだね。
ここはテンペストをよく知る、オンド族を頼りにしよう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002690_YSHTOLA<tab>This structure must have served an important function. And here are yet more crystals...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002690_YSHTOLA見たところ、いかにも重要な施設のようね……。
周りにあるものは、クリスタルかしら……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002700_ALPHINAUD<tab>I too noted the crystal repository on the way. The benthos seem to employ them in their spellcasting.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002700_ALPHINAUD道中にも、大量のクリスタルが保管された部屋があった。
フラウンダーたちは、それから魔物を生み出していたようだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002710_URIANGER<tab>In such vessels did the ancients preserve concepts─ideal forms to be drawn upon in the act of creation.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002710_URIANGERおそらくあのクリスタルは、古代人がイデアを込めたもの。
すなわちここには、彼らが確立してきた、
万物を生み出す概念が保管されているのでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002720_URIANGER<tab>That so great an abundance should reside here lendeth credence to Y'shtola's conclusion. This facility held great significance.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002720_URIANGERこれだけの数があるとなれば、ここは、
かなり重要な意味を持つ建物なのかもしれません……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002730_ANCIENTSA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Thank you all for joining us at Anyder in these most perilous of times.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002730_ANCIENTSA同胞たちよ、この状況の中、
よくぞここ「アニドラス」へと集ってくれた。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002740_ANCIENTSA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>By the summoning of Zodiark have we been granted a reprieve. Yet immutable as the laws He has woven may seem, they will not serve to forestall our doom.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002740_ANCIENTSAゾディアークの召喚によって、災厄は鎮まった。
かの神が紡いだ理は、強固に見えるが……さて……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002750_ANCIENTSB<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Nay. Should we continue down this path, our fate will be the same.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002750_ANCIENTSBいいや、我々が今のままで在り続けるかぎり、
どれほど制御を試みたとて、
終末を先延ばしにしているにすぎん……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002760_ANCIENTSB<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>I said as much to the Convocation, of course, but the stubborn fools turned a deaf ear to my warnings.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002760_ANCIENTSB十四人委員会にも、そう進言したが、
残念ながら、取り合ってはもらえなんだ……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002770_ANCIENTSB<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>I had hoped that the defector, at least, would side with us, but I regret to report our overtures have gone unanswered.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002770_ANCIENTSB委員会を去った「あの者」も、
中立を貫くつもりか、我々の勧誘に応じる様子がない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002780_ANCIENTSB<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Whither tend your thoughts, Venat? Where you lead, we will follow.<var 48 01 /var>
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002780_ANCIENTSB<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>我らが長、ヴェーネス様、いかがなさるおつもりですか？<var 48 01 /var>

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002790_VENAS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>I shall not speak ill of the Convocation─they too seek only to secure the future of our star.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002790_VENAS……彼らを責めるような物言いはなりません。
願うところは我らと同じ、星の健やかなる未来なのですから。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002800_VENAS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Yet it is plain they will not countenance a permanent solution. That being the case, we must ask ourselves a simple question: are we prepared to pursue our chosen course, even should it mean suffering the eternal condemnation of our brethren?<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002800_VENASむしろ己に問うのです。
彼らや、多くの同胞と相対することになっても、
この道を善しと信じられるのかを……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002810_VENAS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>If so, I see no further reason to demur.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002810_VENASできるのならば、進みましょう。
すべてを止めるための、「枷」を生み出すのです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002820_VENAS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Let us bring forth the Light that shall ever after keep the Darkness in check.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002820_VENAS「闇」なるゾディアークと対をなすもの……
「光」なる……ハイデリンを……

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002830_YSHTOLA<tab>So...it was they who first summoned Hydaelyn.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002830_YSHTOLA今のは……弁論の記録、かしら……。
彼らがハイデリンの召喚者だというの……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002840_ALPHINAUD<tab>Their discussion did seem to imply as much, yes. I cannot say I have ever heard of this “Venat” before.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002840_ALPHINAUDそのようだね……。
「ヴェーネス」という名前は、初めて聞いたかな……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002850_URIANGER<tab>For a certainty, Emet-Selch never uttered the name, speak though he did of the schism which Zodiark's advent wrought upon mankind.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002850_URIANGERふむ……エメトセルクが語ったところでは、
ゾディアークの強大な力を巡って、人の意見は割れたといいます。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002860_URIANGER<tab>Some were of the viewpoint that His power must needs be restrained, and to that end did they call forth She who would serve as His shackles.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002860_URIANGERそして、その力を封じるべきと主張する者たちによって、
「枷」となる、ハイデリンが生み出されたと……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002870_URIANGER<tab>We know now that it was this Venat to whom they looked for leadership.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002870_URIANGER彼らについての情報は今まで得られていませんでしたが、
指導者の名を借りるなら、さしずめ「ヴェーネス派」、
といったところでしょうか。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002880_YSHTOLA<tab>And that this place, in all likelihood, served as their headquarters. The presence of such intimate records attests to that.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002880_YSHTOLAそんな人たちの弁論が保管されているということは、
ここ……アニドラスという場所は、
ヴェーネス派の拠点と考えてよさそうね。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002890_YSHTOLA<tab>I would hear what else they have to tell us. All of it. Did anyone see the source of the image?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002890_YSHTOLA上等よ、どうにかしてさっきの続きか、
ほかの記録を閲覧したいところだけれど……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002900_YSHTOLA<tab>The device there? Then let us see what other secrets it holds.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002900_YSHTOLA記録が流れるときに、あの端末が反応していたと……。
いいわ、試してみましょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002910_ANCIENTSA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Venat, please... Why must it be you?<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002910_ANCIENTSAヴェーネス様……。
ハイデリン召喚の際は、やはり、あなたが……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002920_ANCIENTSA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>If I may speak plainly, I would sooner it were another─<var 1A 02 /var>any<var 1A 01 /var> other. You are our <var 1A 02 /var>leader<var 1A 01 /var>. None can take your place.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002920_ANCIENTSAあなたには、できることなら最後まで残り、
我らを導いてほしいのだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002930_VENAS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>You know as well as I that but few support our cause. Far fewer than they who place their faith in Zodiark.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002930_VENASご存知のとおり、この召喚に賛同してくれる者の数は、
ゾディアークのときに比べ、とても少ない……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002940_VENAS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>If Hydaelyn is to stand a chance of opposing Him, I am the only one who might suffice as Her heart.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002940_VENASそれでもかの神の「枷」となるほどの存在を生み出すには、
私自身が核になるほかないでしょう。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002950_VENAS<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Rest assured, however: I shall not vanish from this world. The form I take shall ever remain my choice.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002950_VENAS……大丈夫、核になるということは、
消えるということではありません。
私がどう在るかは、いつだって私次第です。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002960_ANCIENTSA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>...Then I will press you no more. Only know this...you will be sorely missed.<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002960_ANCIENTSAそうおっしゃるなら、止めるのはよそう。
ただ……いち個人としては……惜別にたえない。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002970_ANCIENTSA<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>I wonder...is this how the Convocation felt about Elidibus?<var 48 01 /var>
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002970_ANCIENTSAもしかしたら、あのエリディブスを、
ゾディアークの核として捧げた十四人委員会も……
同じような気持ちでいるのかもしれないな。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002980_YSHTOLA<tab>What?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002980_YSHTOLA<tab>どういうこと……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002990_YSHTOLA<tab>Forgive me, but did that not strongly imply that Elidibus sacrificed himself to become Zodiark's heart?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_002990_YSHTOLAエリディブスは、ゾディアーク召喚の際に、
核として……命を捧げていたというの……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003000_ALISAIE<tab>Seven hells... Then who─or <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var>─are we dealing with?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003000_ALISAIEじゃあ、私たちの前に現れたエリディブスは……
いったい何だったのよ……！？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003010_ALPHINAUD<tab>Dare I ask what's going on?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003010_ALPHINAUD<tab>これはいったい、なんの騒ぎだい……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003020_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>Ah, excellent timing. For me, in any case. We have a problem.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003020_MYSTERYVOICEああ、戻ったのか。
少しばかり、困ったことになっている……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003030_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>The vast majority of those gathered here are presently in the employ of the guard or else one of the facets...and no longer wish to be so.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003030_MYSTERYVOICE彼らは衛兵団や工芸館で働いていた者たちなのだが、
急に職を辞したいと申し出てきたのだ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003040_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>In principle, all are free to change vocation at any time─but a city does require a certain number of people in these positions if it is to continue to function. For the moment, I have asked them to postpone their resignation until such time as replacements can be found.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003040_MYSTERYVOICEもちろん、それは個人の自由だが、
あまりの人数に、都市の機能にも影響が出かねない状況でね……。
少なくとも引き継ぎの猶予をと、説得していたのだよ。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003050_MYSTERYVOICE<tab>As you may have surmised, we have the “Warrior of Light” to thank for this...
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003050_MYSTERYVOICEどうやら、あの「光の戦士」、
アルバートの影響のようなのだが……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003060_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>It's you! The Warrior of Darkness!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003060_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>あ、あなたは「闇の戦士」様じゃないですか……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003070_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>You understand, don't you?
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003070_BRAVESOLDIERきっとあなたなら、わかってくれますよね？
俺たちは、「光の戦士」を目指したいんです！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003080_BRAVESOLDIER<tab>Someone's going to have to look after this place once you're gone. We just want to be ready to do our bit when the time comes.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003080_BRAVESOLDIERいつか去りゆく、あなたたちに代わって、
この世界を俺たち自身の手で護っていきたい……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003090_SOLDIER03608<tab>And not only here, but everywhere! Which is why we've got to get out there, and lend a hand to those in need.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003090_SOLDIER03608だからこそ自分たちは、クリスタリウムだけに留まらず、
世界の力になるため、旅に出ようと思うんです。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003100_SOLDIER03608<tab>That's what you did, isn't it? Even if it was just little things, at the start. You helped people.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003100_SOLDIER03608あなたも、「光の戦士」様も、英雄への第一歩は、
旅の中での小さな人助けだったのでしょう……？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>People, chocobos, you name it.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>そのとおりだ

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Well, yes...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>間違いはない

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A8_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_A8_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>…………

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003110_SOLDIER03608<tab>And we're trying to do the same! We may have our sky back, but there's no shortage of people who still need help.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003110_SOLDIER03608だから、我々もそれを見習おうと思うんです！
空から光は掃われましたが、それでもまだ、
この世界には助けを必要としている人が、必ずいるはず……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003120_SOLDIER03608<tab>Strong and silent─just as a hero should be! You let your actions speak for you, and we mean to do the same. We might have our sky back, but there are still people who need help.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003120_SOLDIER03608否定もしないということは、間違いではないようですね……。
空から光は掃われましたが、それでもまだ、
この世界には助けを必要としている人が、必ずいるはず……。

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003130_SOLDIER03608<tab>If we follow in your footsteps, then I choose to believe we too can be heroes one day. Even Warriors of Light.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003130_SOLDIER03608そうした人々に手を差し伸べることから始めたい。
我々は、あなたや「光の戦士」様に続きたいんです……！

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003140_ALPHINAUD<tab>What are we to say to that? We can hardly tell them they are mistaken.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_05200_003140_ALPHINAUDこれは……難儀だね。
彼らは何も間違ったことは言っていない。
